root: ^And yet, somewhere deep within the hollow cathedral of your chest, something is missing
^A black sun devouring all warmth, all hunger, all trace of self.
^The words that leave your lips ring empty, like sermons to a god long gone.
^Emptiness in speech, emptiness in your lessons, emptiness in the soul that preaches them.
^O Lord… is this what You call redemption, or punishment?
